document.full_text: french open champion francesca schiavone suffered a major setback on wednesday when she was beaten on her first outing on clay this season at the stuttgart grand prix.
document.title: french open winner schiavone makes losing return on clay
lines_and_colors: french open champion francesca schiavone suffered a major setback on wednesday when she was beaten on her first outing on clay this season at the stuttgart grand prix.
